component.name: MPC-QT
component.summary: Media Player Classic reimplemented with Qt and libmpv

description.p: Open source media player focusing on ease of use and effectiveness.
description.ul:
Multiple playlists
Video preview on seekbar (thumbnail)
Quick queueing like xmms/qmmp
Play online videos (with youtube-dl)
Configurable shortcuts and mouse buttons
Multimedia keys support (Mpris)
Web interface
Thumbnails makerw

ul.li: A video preview is shown on the seek bar.
Improved shuffle feature, playlist view and new music mode.
The keys editor has a search field and a better workflow.
Subtitles additions for deaf or hard-of-hearing (SDH) can be automatically hidden.
Bigger icons and updated subtitles icon.
The interface language can be forced to English.
Fixes a long standing bug that could lead to a crash.
Fixes a regression for Nvidia GPUs introduced by previous version.
Fixes the new "remember file position" feature.
Position, audio, video and subtitle tracks can now be remembered for 1000 videos.
Seek bar is easier to use.
Active subtitle, audio and video tracks are shown.
Subtitles delay and video aspect ratio are adjustable.
Current and total time and other information shown in OSD.
